bio.p: Francesca Coperchini completed her University education in 2009 obtaining the degree of Specialized Biologist at University of Pavia. She is Specialist in Clinical Pathology at University of Pavia and she is Researcher Biologist at Laboratory for Endocrine Disruptors, ICS Maugeri SpA â€“I.R.C.C.S, Pavia. Her Research fields are: role of chemokines in autoimmune endocrine disorders and thyroid cancer, endocrine disruptors.
